professionalSummary: Mechanically trained R&D Engineer with proven expertise in robotic integration, precision system design, and industrial automation. Specializes in developing turnkey solutions combining mechanical hardware, robotics, machine vision, and AI-driven inspection systems for high-tech manufacturing. Skilled in system integration, tooling design, and process optimization for complex production environments.

experience.title: Application & Computer Vision Engineer
responsibilities: Designed, prototyped, and integrated robotic fixtures and end-of-arm tooling for multi-robot automated manufacturing systems.
Led system integration and on-site commissioning of industrial robotic cells (ABB, UR, KUKA, Fanuc), resolving mechanical and system-level issues in high-demand production environments.
Collaborated with cross-disciplinary teams to deliver automated inspection and defect detection solutions, contributing to tooling optimization and process improvement initiatives.

experience.title: Research & Development Engineer
responsibilities: Developed a proprietary vision-based inspection system and capacitive sensor technology for FMCG packaging inspection, including full machine prototype design and integration.
Conducted FEA and CFD analysis for wind turbine concepts to assess renewable energy feasibility in Singapore’s urban environment.

Led development of adaptive, reconfigurable inspection systems leverage computer graphic, integrating robotic platforms, custom sensors, and AI-driven inspection planning to enhance process efficiency.
Experience in leading small team and project management. Recorded 7 internal research invention as main/co-inventor.

experience.title: Tech Lead & Co-Mechanical Lead (Undergraduate Research Team)
responsibilities: Directed a team of 30 engineers to design and build autonomous underwater vehicles, managing schedules, resource allocation, and risk assessments.
Designed and coordinated simulation, system integration, and testing for competition-ready robotics systems, achieving international championship.

awards: Specialisation in Robotics (Kinematics, Control & Soft Robotic)
JTC-NUS Gold Medal for Most Innovative FYP – Robotic Eye Surgery
First Place at NUS IEEE Hackathon – Best Innovative & Mind-blowing Hack

education.degree: Diploma in Aerospace Technology (with Business Minor)
awards: Multiple academic awards in Innovation, Engineering Design, and Leadership
